snippet: Seattle’s broken tunnel boring machine is slated to start digging again by November and should reach the north end of downtown in about a year, officials said.
abstract: Tunnel boring machine that broke down in 2013 during roadway project in Seattle is scheduled to start digging again in several months; tunnel is expected to reach downtown Seattle three years behind schedule.
lead_paragraph: Seattle’s broken tunnel boring machine is slated to start digging again by November and should reach the north end of downtown in about a year, officials said.

headline.main: Washington: Repairs Near End for Giant Tunnel-Digging Machine
headline.print_headline: Washington: Repairs Near End for Giant Tunnel-Digging Machine
